attributes.action: Tell us if you agree that it is dishonest politicians which prevent us joining registers.
attributes.additional_details: Recent announcements tell us that we have the lowest list of, for instance, bone marrow donors in the modern world.  This allied with the need for a DNA database but which it is far too dangerous for us to have, is ONLY because we simply cannot trust our politicians, nor our police forces to resist the temptation to use or misuse the information therein to their own personal benefit, ESPECIALLY where they see a chance to make a quick few quid on the side.  This is an appalling but absolutely true indictment of you and your cronies, you cannot fail to agree?
